name: Creep (rayzchen)
description:
This is a game made for the PB Jam 4 (2020) and the theme was SNEAKY. It features 5 levels filled with difficult challenges, which all require a lot of skill and patience.

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - search on the ground

U - use potion (if you have one)

O - Open things with a key or crowbar, or go down a hole
